<script>
// Check material link availability and disable missing ones
document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
  document.querySelectorAll('.material-link').forEach(function(link) {
    var href = link.getAttribute('href');
    if (!href) return;
    fetch(href, { method: 'HEAD' }).then(function(response) {
      if (!response.ok) {
        link.textContent = 'Coming soon';
        link.removeAttribute('href');
        link.classList.add('disabled');
      }
    }).catch(function() {
      link.textContent = 'Coming soon';
      link.removeAttribute('href');
      link.classList.add('disabled');
    });
  });
});
</script>
